title: OpenZoo: Legacy — Set Page Is Live
subtitle: Browse every card, filter quickly, and share deep links
author: gaichu
excerpt: The OpenZoo Legacy set page just dropped. It’s fast, linkable, and ready for your lore dives.
bodyHtml:
OpenZoo: Legacy is now live on Gaichu. You can browse the full set, search by name, and link directly to any card.

  • Lightning-fast filters
  • OG tags for clean previews when you share
  • Mobile layout tweaks for smoother swiping

Got feedback or a favorite pull? Drop it in Discord—always building in public.

title: We’re Posting News on Gaichu!
subtitle: Housekeeping + what to expect
author: gaichu
excerpt: New section, who dis? You’ll now see short updates on releases, site improvements, and spicy TCG takes right here.
bodyHtml:
Welcome to the Gaichu news feed. I’ll use this space for quick posts: release notes, feature previews, and highlights from the parody & indie TCG world. Expect a few blurbs a week—short, readable, and linkable.

Want more signal? Hit the News tab or follow the social links in the footer. Let’s make the homepage feel alive.
